mapper.select: select c.coupon_id, c.coupon_code, c.description, c.coupon_type, c.discount_amount, c.discount_percentage, c.minimum_order_amount, c.expiry_date, c.is_active, c.created_at from COUPON c join USER_COUPON uc on c.coupon_id = uc.coupon_id where expiry_date > now() and uc.valid_until > now() and uc.is_used = false and uc.user_id=#{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_COUPON_USAGE (user_coupon_id, order_id, used_at) SELECT user_coupon_id, #{orderId}, NOW() FROM USER_COUPON WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND coupon_id = #{couponId}
